title: Why was the Town Creek Elementary School located near the Rt17 and Rt87 intersection?  There is little evidence that the Rice Plantation will be built soon.  It appears unethical to build a school primarily for the benefit of a developer.  Who are the principles in this real estate enterprise?  Why did the School Board agree to build the school first? What are the Planning Boards plans for the zoning of land near this site esp. on Rt 87.  Concern for over comercializing this intersection
